column4: I currently pay for web hosting service....is there a better/cheaper way of doing this with Amazon/Ubuntu/Eucalyptus???
I currently pay for web hosting service....is there a better/cheaper way of doing this with Amazon/Ubuntu/Eucalyptus???
It depends on what kind of hosting you are attempting to do... If it is a large website than it could be cheaper
it is rather small, I am a teacher and I use it for my class
